title: Correction: Time Slices: What Is the Duration of a Percept?
fullText:
Notice of Republication

This article was republished on May 19th, 2016 to correct poor figure quality in the PDF version, which was introduced during the typesetting process. The publisher apologizes for these issues with the figure quality. Please download this article again to view the updated version.
